cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplateDisplayName: E-commerce - Order status notification to customer
cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplateText:
Status of your order has changed.

The status of your order has changed to '{% Order.OrderStatus.DisplayName|(encode)true |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)6a8556ec67462a82c6357981f1f0125b9aae4ed8a49f5f09b9ea7e557bc87fd3%}'.
